text: Of the priests, those who usurped the office of the priesthood and were not found: the sons of5:38 Habaiah, or Hobaiah. Obdia, the sons of5:38 Hakkoz. Akkos, the sons of Jaddus, who married Augia one of the daughters of5:38 Barzillai. Another reading is, Phaezeldaeus. Zorzelleus, and was called after his name.
